languages.text: {n}Соломон бегло осматривается по сторонам, точно выискивая кого-то, и уверенно кивает вам.{/n}
{n}Solomorne casts a quick glance around, as if looking for someone, and then nods at you confidently.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон бегло осматривается по сторонам, точно выискивая кого-то, и уверенно кивает вам.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne sieht sich kurz um, als würde er jemanden suchen, und nickt dir dann zuversichtlich zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casts a quick glance around, as if looking for someone, and then nods at you confidently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne sieht sich kurz um, als würde er jemanden suchen, und nickt dir dann zuversichtlich zu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne jette un rapide coup d'œil autour de lui, comme s'il cherchait quelqu'un, puis vous adresse un hochement de tête assuré.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casts a quick glance around, as if looking for someone, and then nods at you confidently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne jette un rapide coup d'œil autour de lui, comme s'il cherchait quelqu'un, puis vous adresse un hochement de tête assuré.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙迅速环顾四周，似乎在寻找什么人，随后向你自信地点了点头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casts a quick glance around, as if looking for someone, and then nods at you confidently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙迅速环顾四周，似乎在寻找什么人，随后向你自信地点了点头。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne mira brevemente a su alrededor, como si buscara a alguien, y asiente con confianza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casts a quick glance around, as if looking for someone, and then nods at you confidently.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは周囲を素早く見渡し、誰かを探すように一瞥した後、自信満々にうなずいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casts a quick glance around, as if looking for someone, and then nods at you confidently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは周囲を素早く見渡し、誰かを探すように一瞥した後、自信満々にうなずいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, sanki birini arıyormuş gibi etrafına hızlıca göz attıktan sonra kendinden emin bir şekilde başını sallıyor.{/n}
